summary: William -Sanford Lynn was born June 14, 1922, in Alabama. He is a Professor of Medicine at Duke University in Durham, North Carolina. His work has been recognized by the American Society of Biological Chemists, American Association of Physicians, and the Biophysical Society. For more information on William Lynn, visit his website.
